entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
